title: Collaborative Learning Through Digital Games to Cultivate Ethical Creativity

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device utilization skills and basic awareness of social issues
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning program aimed at developing ethical creativity through mobile-based microlearning in a smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environment.

learning_goals: Learners can propose over three creative ideas reflecting social responsibility through collaborative problem-solving in a digital game environment.
Learners discuss and explore alternatives for ethical dilemmas occurring in virtual learning environments with over 80% participation.
Learners can enhance their ethical creativity level by three stages or more using game-based assessment tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
